titles.title: Commuter Conservation and Employee Flexibility Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an employee to elect to receive taxable cash compensation in lieu of nontaxable parking benefits, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/22/1997--Introduced. Commuter Conservation and Employee Flexibility Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit an employee to elect to receive taxable cash compensation in lieu of nontaxable parking benefits.
